sqlMap.statement:
SELECT A.PUBLISHKEY,A.QUESTIONINSKEY,A.QUESTIONKEY,A.TITLE,A.CREATETIME,A.STARTTIME,A.ENDTIME,A.PASSSCORE,A.ANSWERTIME,A.QMODE,A.SHOWSOLUTION,A.STATE,A.ISPUBLIC, A.CREATOR,A.PUBLISHMODE,A.ISPCSUBJECT,A.ARCHIVED,B.TITLE AS QUESTIONNAIRETITLE,B.QUESTIONTYPE FROM T12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE A INNER JOIN T12_QUESTION_INS B ON A.QUESTIONINSKEY=B.QUESTIONINSKEY
A.PUBLISHKEY = #publishkey#
A.TITLE LIKE '%'||#title#||'%'
B.TITLE LIKE '%'||#questionnaireTitle#||'%'
A.FLAG=#flag#
A.STATE=#state#
A.CREATETIME >=#createtime_begin#
A.CREATETIME <=#createtime_end#
B.QUESTIONTYPE=#questiontype#
A.ARCHIVED = #archived#
ORDER BY $sort$ $sort_type$

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE A INNER JOIN T12_QUESTION_INS B ON A.QUESTIONINSKEY=B.QUESTIONINSKEY
A.PUBLISHKEY = #publishkey#
A.TITLE LIKE '%'||#title#||'%'
B.TITLE LIKE '%'||#questionnaireTitle#||'%'
A.FLAG=#flag#
A.STATE=#state#
A.CREATETIME >=#createtime_begin#
A.CREATETIME <=#createtime_end#
B.QUESTIONTYPE=#questiontype#
A.ARCHIVED = #archived#

select a.realname as user_name, b.organname as user_org, f.score as user_score, e.answerkey, d.questionkey, d.questioninskey from T00_USER a LEFT JOIN T00_USER_ATTR c ON A.USERNAME = C.USERNAME LEFT JOIN t00_organ b ON C.ORGANKEY = B.ORGANKEY, T12_publish_questionnaire d, T12_answer_questionnaire e, T12_JUDGMENT_QUESTIONNAIRE g, (SELECT JUDGMENTKEY, SUM(SCORE) AS SCORE FROM T12_JUDGMENT_SUBJECT GROUP BY JUDGMENTKEY) f where a.username = e.username and e.publishkey = d.publishkey and e.STATE = '1' and g.judgmentkey = f.JUDGMENTKEY and g.answerkey = e.answerkey
d.publishkey = #publishkey#

select count(*) from T00_USER a LEFT JOIN T00_USER_ATTR c ON A.USERNAME = C.USERNAME LEFT JOIN t00_organ b ON C.ORGANKEY = B.ORGANKEY, T12_publish_questionnaire d, T12_answer_questionnaire e, T12_JUDGMENT_QUESTIONNAIRE g, (SELECT JUDGMENTKEY, SUM(SCORE) AS SCORE FROM T12_JUDGMENT_SUBJECT GROUP BY JUDGMENTKEY) f where a.username = e.username and e.publishkey = d.publishkey and e.STATE = '1' and g.judgmentkey = f.JUDGMENTKEY and g.answerkey = e.answerkey
d.publishkey = #publishkey#

select count(*) from T00_USER a, t00_organ b, T00_USER_ATTR c, T12_publish_questionnaire d, T12_answer_questionnaire e where a.username = c.username and b.organkey = c.organkey and a.username = e.username and e.publishkey = d.publishkey and e.STATE = '1'
d.publishkey = #publishkey#

select w.*,w.title as question_name,case when f.state is null then '0'else f.state end as answer_state,J.totalscore from T12_PUBLISH_USER t right join t12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE w on t.publishkey = w.publishkey LEFT JOIN T12_ANSWER_QUESTIONNAIRE f on w.publishkey = f.publishkey AND F.USERNAME=T.USERNAME LEFT JOIN T12_JUDGMENT_QUESTIONNAIRE JQ ON JQ.ANSWERKEY=F.ANSWERKEY LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(A.SCORE) AS totalscore,A.JUDGMENTKEY FROM T12_JUDGMENT_SUBJECT A ,T12_JUDGMENT_QUESTIONNAIRE B WHERE A.JUDGMENTKEY=B.JUDGMENTKEY GROUP BY A.JUDGMENTKEY )J ON J.JUDGMENTKEY=JQ.JUDGMENTKEY where t.USERNAME = #user_Id# and t.USERTYPE = '0' and t.PUBLISHKEY in (select a.PUBLISHKEY from t12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE a, t12_QUESTIONNAIRE b WHERE a.QUESTIONKEY = b.QUESTIONKEY and b.FLAG = '1'
a.TITLE LIKE '%'||#question_name#||'%'
and a.state = '2') and t.PUBLISHKEY = w.PUBLISHKEY and (f.state != '1' or f.state is null) AND W.FLAG='1' AND W.ARCHIVED='0' AND W.STATE='2' AND (W.PUBLISHMODE = '1' OR W.PUBLISHMODE='3')
#current_time# >= w.starttime
#current_time# <= w.endtime

select count(w.title) from T12_PUBLISH_USER t right join t12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE w on t.publishkey = w.publishkey LEFT JOIN T12_ANSWER_QUESTIONNAIRE f on w.publishkey = f.publishkey AND F.USERNAME=T.USERNAME LEFT JOIN T12_JUDGMENT_QUESTIONNAIRE JQ ON JQ.ANSWERKEY=F.ANSWERKEY LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(A.SCORE) AS totalscore,A.JUDGMENTKEY FROM T12_JUDGMENT_SUBJECT A ,T12_JUDGMENT_QUESTIONNAIRE B WHERE A.JUDGMENTKEY=B.JUDGMENTKEY GROUP BY A.JUDGMENTKEY )J ON J.JUDGMENTKEY=JQ.JUDGMENTKEY where t.USERNAME = #user_Id# and t.USERTYPE = '0' and t.PUBLISHKEY in (select a.PUBLISHKEY from t12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE a, t12_QUESTIONNAIRE b WHERE a.QUESTIONKEY = b.QUESTIONKEY and b.FLAG = '1'
a.TITLE LIKE '%'||#question_name#||'%'
and a.state = '2') and t.PUBLISHKEY = w.PUBLISHKEY and (f.state != '1' or f.state is null) AND W.FLAG='1' AND W.ARCHIVED='0' AND W.STATE='2' AND (W.PUBLISHMODE = '1' OR W.PUBLISHMODE='3')
#current_time# >= w.starttime
#current_time# <= w.endtime

select w.*,w.title as question_name,case when f.state is null then '0'else f.state end as answer_state,J.totalscore from T12_PUBLISH_USER t right join t12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE w on t.publishkey = w.publishkey LEFT JOIN T12_ANSWER_QUESTIONNAIRE f on w.publishkey = f.publishkey AND F.USERNAME=T.USERNAME LEFT JOIN T12_JUDGMENT_QUESTIONNAIRE JQ ON JQ.ANSWERKEY=F.ANSWERKEY LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(A.SCORE) AS totalscore,A.JUDGMENTKEY FROM T12_JUDGMENT_SUBJECT A ,T12_JUDGMENT_QUESTIONNAIRE B WHERE A.JUDGMENTKEY=B.JUDGMENTKEY GROUP BY A.JUDGMENTKEY )J ON J.JUDGMENTKEY=JQ.JUDGMENTKEY where t.USERNAME = #user_Id# and t.USERTYPE = '0' and t.PUBLISHKEY in (select a.PUBLISHKEY from t12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE a, T12_QUESTION_INS b WHERE a.QUESTIONINSKEY = b.QUESTIONINSKEY and b.FLAG = '1'
a.TITLE LIKE '%'||#question_name#||'%'
and a.state = '2') and t.PUBLISHKEY = w.PUBLISHKEY and f.state = '1' AND W.FLAG='1' AND W.ARCHIVED='1' AND W.STATE='2' AND W.ISPUBLIC='1' AND (W.PUBLISHMODE = '1' OR W.PUBLISHMODE = '3')

select count(w.title) from T12_PUBLISH_USER t right join t12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE w on t.publishkey = w.publishkey LEFT JOIN T12_ANSWER_QUESTIONNAIRE f on w.publishkey = f.publishkey AND F.USERNAME=T.USERNAME LEFT JOIN T12_JUDGMENT_QUESTIONNAIRE JQ ON JQ.ANSWERKEY=F.ANSWERKEY LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(A.SCORE) AS totalscore,A.JUDGMENTKEY FROM T12_JUDGMENT_SUBJECT A ,T12_JUDGMENT_QUESTIONNAIRE B WHERE A.JUDGMENTKEY=B.JUDGMENTKEY GROUP BY A.JUDGMENTKEY )J ON J.JUDGMENTKEY=JQ.JUDGMENTKEY where t.USERNAME = #user_Id# and t.USERTYPE = '0' and t.PUBLISHKEY in (select a.PUBLISHKEY from t12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE a, T12_QUESTION_INS b WHERE a.QUESTIONINSKEY = b.QUESTIONINSKEY and b.FLAG = '1'
a.TITLE LIKE '%'||#question_name#||'%'
and a.state = '2') and t.PUBLISHKEY = w.PUBLISHKEY and f.state = '1' AND W.FLAG='1' AND W.ARCHIVED='1' AND W.STATE='2' AND W.ISPUBLIC='1' AND (W.PUBLISHMODE = '1' OR W.PUBLISHMODE = '3')

INSERT INTO T12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE(PUBLISHKEY,QUESTIONINSKEY,QUESTIONKEY,TITLE,CREATETIME,STARTTIME,ENDTIME,PASSSCORE,ANSWERTIME,QMODE,SHOWSOLUTION,STATE,ISPUBLIC,CREATOR,MODIFYTIME,MODIFIER,PUBLISHMODE,ISPCSUBJECT,ARCHIVED,FLAG,STOPANSWER,QUESTIONTYPE) VALUES (#publishkey#,#questioninskey#,#questionkey#,#title#,#createtime#,#starttime#,#endtime#,#passscore#,#answertime#,#qmode#,#showsolution#,#state#,#ispublic#,#creator#,#modifytime#,#modifier#,#publishmode#,#ispcsubject#,#archived#,#flag#,#stopanswer#,#questiontype#)

update T12_publish_questionnaire set questionkey=#questionkey#,title=#title#,starttime=#starttime#,endtime=#endtime#,passscore=#passscore#,answertime=#answertime#, qmode=#qmode#,showsolution=#showsolution#,state=#state#,ispublic=#ispublic#,modifytime=#modifytime#,modifier=#modifier#, publishmode=#publishmode# where publishkey=#publishkey#
UPDATE T12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE SET FLAG='2' WHERE PUBLISHKEY=#value#
SELECT * FROM T12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE WHERE PUBLISHKEY=#value#
update T12_publish_questionnaire set state='2' where publishkey=#value#
update T12_publish_questionnaire set stopanswer='1' where publishkey=#publishkey#
select count(*) from T12_PUBLISH_USER t where t.USERTYPE = '0' and t.publishkey = #publishkey#
select count(*) from t12_answer_questionnaire t where t.publishkey = #publishkey# and t.state = '1'

SELECT COUNT(*)FROM ( SELECT ANSWER_QU.USERNAME,ANSWER_QU.PUBLISHKEY FROM T12_JUDGMENT_QUESTIONNAIRE JUDGMENT_QU, T12_ANSWER_QUESTIONNAIRE ANSWER_QU, T12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE PUBLISH_QU, (SELECT SUM(JUDEMENT_SUBJECT.SCORE) SCORE, JUDEMENT_SUBJECT.JUDGMENTKEY FROM T12_JUDGMENT_SUBJECT JUDEMENT_SUBJECT GROUP BY JUDEMENT_SUBJECT.JUDGMENTKEY) TMPA WHERE ANSWER_QU.ANSWERKEY = JUDGMENT_QU.ANSWERKEY AND ANSWER_QU.PUBLISHKEY = PUBLISH_QU.PUBLISHKEY AND TMPA.JUDGMENTKEY =JUDGMENT_QU.JUDGMENTKEY AND TMPA.SCORE >= PUBLISH_QU.PASSSCORE AND ANSWER_QU.STATE = '1' AND ANSWER_QU.PUBLISHKEY=#publishkey# ) TMP

SELECT COALESCE(MAX(TMPA.SCORE),0) AS MAXSCORE,COALESCE(MIN(TMPA.SCORE),0) AS MINSCORE,AVG(FLOAT(COALESCE(TMPA.SCORE,0))) AS AVGESCORE FROM T12_JUDGMENT_QUESTIONNAIRE JUDGMENT_QU, T12_ANSWER_QUESTIONNAIRE ANSWER_QU, (SELECT SUM(JUDEMENT_SUBJECT.SCORE) SCORE, JUDEMENT_SUBJECT.JUDGMENTKEY FROM T12_JUDGMENT_SUBJECT JUDEMENT_SUBJECT GROUP BY JUDEMENT_SUBJECT.JUDGMENTKEY) TMPA WHERE ANSWER_QU.ANSWERKEY= JUDGMENT_QU.ANSWERKEY AND TMPA.JUDGMENTKEY =JUDGMENT_QU.JUDGMENTKEY AND ANSWER_QU.STATE = '1' AND ANSWER_QU.PUBLISHKEY= #publishkey#

SELECT A.PUBLISHKEY,A.QUESTIONKEY,A.TITLE,A.CREATETIME,A.STARTTIME,A.ENDTIME,A.PASSSCORE,A.ANSWERTIME,A.QMODE,A.SHOWSOLUTION,A.STATE,A.ISPUBLIC, A.CREATOR,A.PUBLISHMODE,B.TITLE AS QUESTIONNAIRETITLE,B.QUESTIONTYPE FROM T12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE A INNER JOIN T12_QUESTION_INS B ON A.QUESTIONINSKEY=B.QUESTIONINSKEY and (A.publishmode='1' or A.publishmode='3') and A.state='2' and A.archived='0' AND A.FLAG='1'
A.creator=#creator#
A.TITLE LIKE '%'||#question_name#||'%'

SELECT count(*) FROM T12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE A INNER JOIN T12_QUESTION_INS B ON A.QUESTIONINSKEY=B.QUESTIONINSKEY and (A.publishmode='1' or A.publishmode='3') and A.state='2' and A.archived='0' AND A.FLAG='1'
A.creator=#creator#
A.TITLE LIKE '%'||#question_name#||'%'
update T12_publish_questionnaire set ispublic=#ispublic#,archived=#archived#,ispcsubject=#ispcsubject# where publishkey=#publishkey#

select p.* from T12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE p,T12_PUBLISH_USER u where u.publishkey = p.publishkey and u.usertype='2' and p.archived='1' and (p.publishmode='1' or p.publishmode='3') and p.state='2' and u.username=#user_name#
p.TITLE LIKE '%'||#question_name#||'%'

select count(*) from T12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE p,T12_PUBLISH_USER u where u.publishkey = p.publishkey and u.usertype='2' and p.archived='1' and (p.publishmode='1' or p.publishmode='3') and p.state='2' and u.username=#user_name#
p.TITLE LIKE '%'||#question_name#||'%'

select count(*) from T12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE p,T12_PUBLISH_USER u where u.publishkey = p.publishkey and u.usertype='2' and p.archived='1' and (p.publishmode='1' or p.publishmode='3') and p.state='2' and u.username=#user_name#
p.TITLE LIKE '%'||#question_name#||'%'

SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(ANSWER_QU.ANSWERKEY),0) AS ANSWERNUM FROM T12_JUDGMENT_QUESTIONNAIRE JUDGMENT_QU, T12_ANSWER_QUESTIONNAIRE ANSWER_QU, (SELECT SUM(JUDEMENT_SUBJECT.SCORE) SCORE, JUDEMENT_SUBJECT.JUDGMENTKEY FROM T12_JUDGMENT_SUBJECT JUDEMENT_SUBJECT GROUP BY JUDEMENT_SUBJECT.JUDGMENTKEY) TMPA WHERE ANSWER_QU.ANSWERKEY= JUDGMENT_QU.ANSWERKEY AND TMPA.JUDGMENTKEY =JUDGMENT_QU.JUDGMENTKEY AND ANSWER_QU.STATE = '1' AND ANSWER_QU.PUBLISHKEY= #publishkey# AND TMPA.SCORE BETWEEN #downlimit# AND #toplimit#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T12_ANSWER_QUESTIONNAIRE AQ,T00_USER_ATTR UA,T12_PUBLISH_QUESTIONNAIRE PQ WHERE AQ.PUBLISHKEY= #publishkey# AND AQ.USERNAME=UA.USERNAME AND PQ.PUBLISHKEY=AQ.PUBLISHKEY AND PQ.QUESTIONTYPE='2' AND UA.SEX='1'
